DOC.brief_summary: Normal breastfed infant develop iron deficiency 6 month age . This trial test hypothesis regular provision source iron begin 4 month age improve iron status could prevent iron deficiency . This prospective randomize trial involve breastfed infant . To eligible , infant predominantly breastfed ( < 200 ml/day formula ) 4 month age . At 4 month infant randomly assign one two intervention control . The intervention consist daily administration medicinal iron dose 7.5 mg ( Medicinal Iron Group ) daily feed one jar iron-fortified cereal provide 7 mg iron day ( Cereal Group ) . The control group receive complementary food choose parent source iron provide investigator . The intervention take place 4 9 month . All infant subsequently follow 2 year age .
DOC.brief_title: Iron Breast-Fed Infant : Iron Status Two Regimens Iron Supplementation
DOC.criteria: Predominantly breastfed ( 4 month ) term infant Not predominantly breastfed 4 month Premature infant
